title: Mystery at Camp White Cloud
description: Mystery at Camp White Cloud tells how Frankie and Gil follow clues to solve a campground mystery. Campers are scared when warnings appear carved into the cabin walls, and the director threatens to close camp early. Frankie and Gil save the day when their detective work pays off, and the children are allowed to stay at camp after all.
highFrequencyWords: calamity, celebrating, chimed, concerned, kayaking, lurking, mandatory, mysteriously, planks, prowler, urgently, woodworking
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Nouns                : Identify and create proper nouns
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
